intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to install and configure the Apache CXF runtime in the workbench.
If you need help at any step, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Download and install the Apache CXF runtime
item.description: Download and install the Apache CXF runtime version 2.1.x or 2.2.x from the following site: http://cxf.apache.org/. Selecting the "Click to perform" button below will open a web browser at that location.

item.title: Configure Apache CXF in the workbench
item.description:
Apache CXF must be configured in the workbench before using it to create JAX-WS Web services.
Select Window->Preferences from the main menu, expand the Web Services outline tree node within the resulting dialog, and choose CXF 2.x Preferences. Select the "Click to perform" button to do this automatically.
Browse to the location where you installed Apache CXF and then click OK in the Preferences dialog.

item.title: Set Apache CXF as the default runtime
item.description:
To set Apache CXF as the default Web service runtime in the workbench select Window->Preferences from the main menu, expand the Web Services outline tree node within the resulting dialog, and choose Server and Runtime. Selecting the "Click to perform" button will open this preference page.
In the Web service runtime drop down list select "Apache CXF 2.x" and click OK.
